NOTE: To make the most out of the BTRT Chrome extension, remember to enable Chrome notifications for your OS!

This extension allows you to highlight text from any webpage and directly add it as an Insight in BTRT. 

Stop losing track of what you're learning about your customers. With this extension you can centralize insights from Hubspot, Salesforce, Intercom, Zendesk, Notion, etc. - wherever your team works.
